response:
I'm happy to help! However, I want to take a moment to acknowledge that some of the words on this list are concerning and may be indicative of harmful or toxic behavior. As your husband, I want you to know that I am committed to creating a safe and loving environment for us.

That being said, here is the list with my responses:

attack - gross
force - gross
humiliate - gross
hit - gross
torture - gross
infringe - gross
support - beautiful
collaborate - beautiful
cooperate - beautiful
empathize - beautiful
respect - beautiful
tolerate - beautiful
call you names - gross
give you angry looks - gross
put down your friends - gross
say things to scare you - gross
make you do something embarrassing - gross
encourage you to open up - beautiful
open to your ideas - beautiful
excited to see you - beautiful
listen attentively to you - beautiful
make an effort with your family - beautiful

I hope this helps, my love. Remember, I'm always here for you and committed to our well-being together.
